AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: make it true if you want joel md  bot to view status.

MODE.description: make it public or private bot

AUTO_TYPING.description: make it true to enable auto typing

AUTO_STICKER.description: make it true to enable auto sticker or false to do not

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: make it true  to change your wapresence into available...

READ_MESSAGE.description: make it true  to read messages

ANTI_VV.description: make it true  to activate ant view once

AUTO_REACT.description: make it true  to react on messages

ANTI_LINK.description: make it true  to auto delete links in groups
